title: A VARy Controversial Weekend
description:
The FC crew are joined by Mark Clattenburg to break down the worst PL decisions of the weekend including West Ham's disallowed goal and Virigl Van Dijk's possible red card in the Merseyside derby. Plus, Mario Melchiot joins the show to give his thoughts on Chelsea's summer transfer window and discuss why the Blues have started so poorly this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: EPL weekend VAR review; Mbappe says Neymar relationship is hot and cold; Mario Melchiot on Chelsea's shaky start
